document.full_text: the world's biggest economies hope to make progress this week on a plan to identify countries that put the global economy at risk, while china warned against any moves that would curb its red-hot growth.
document.title: g20 to work on imbalances plan amid crowded agenda
lines_and_colors: the world's biggest economies hope to make progress this week on a plan to identify countries that put the global economy at risk, while china warned against any moves that would curb its red-hot growth.
